sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Working *************Do not Edit*****************</description>
        <name>UI action -  multiple ASMT// Work_v2</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    var metType = [];
    var i;

    var survey_response = new GlideRecord('asmt_assessment_instance');
    survey_response.addQuery('trigger_id', current.parent.sys_id);
    survey_response.addQuery('state=complete'); // need to enable at last
    survey_response.addQuery('metric_type.display_value', 'Review Assessment').addOrCondition('metric_type.display_value', 'Review Intiiation Assessment').addOrCondition('metric_type.display_value', 'Demand Assessment')
    survey_response.addQuery('ORDERBYcreated_on');
    survey_response.query();
    while (survey_response.next()) {
		var compASMT = survey_response.getValue('sys_id');
		metType.push(compASMT);

    }

	gs.addInfoMessage(metType[0]);
	gs.addInfoMessage(metType[1]);
	gs.addInfoMessage(metType[2]);

   g_scratchpad.cmsID = metType[0];
	




    //g_scratchpad.cmsID = priorASMT;


})(current, previous);]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>Gokul Nath</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-09-29 12:42:00</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>a285ca8a4765f190020ba9f8536d4381</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>UI action -  multiple ASMT// Work_v2</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_a285ca8a4765f190020ba9f8536d4381</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>Gokul Nath</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-09-29 12:42:00</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
